Stable Estimation of Intron Retention levels from RNA-seq data

result.original_header: SIRFindeR: Stable Estimation of Intron Retention levels from RNA-seq data
result.value: SIRFindeR is an R package for detecting and quantifying Intron Retention levels using Second and Third Generation RNA-Sequencing data.
SIRFindeR: Stable Estimation of Intron Retention levels from RNA-seq data

parent_header: SIRFindeR: Stable Estimation of Intron Retention levels from RNA-seq data
result.value:
So as to install SIRFindeR in a R session from GitHub, you will need the R package *devtools*. 
You can install it using:

```

install.packages("devtools")
   
```
Then, install SIRFindeR with:

```

devtools::install_github("lbroseus/SIRFindeR", build_vignette = TRUE)
   
```
